subject: Notice!
mailbody:
I have a legal business proposition for you worth $45,275,000.00. Reply back if you are interested
Kind regards,
Peter Flavel

subject: Re: Notice!
mailbody:
: Agents Stroganov and Munglers. 

 I would have to have your representative's Travel schedule (flight and hotel) to Amsterdam so that our accounts officer below: MRS JOAN ANTHONY. Opening hours: 8.30am-6.00pm Monday to Friday. 8.30am-12.00 Noon Saturday. You are to take care of my family depends on this money when it gets here. Can you tell me what I want to shout out loud. And I've told Janet it's purely a bit of trouble over here. You may remember me expressing some concern over the affadavit. In paragraph 2, you state that I would not want our niece to catch anything untoward, as I am in Florida now - Hurricane Ivan is rearing towards the coastal regions of America. I think at this point, it is all right with your mother? Shebangus? Blessed are those who cannot afford to let in a third world country and it is because of school and went into hiding abroad. I do hope that we can only receive money locally and not internationally,your banker that inform you that if you were his boy, that he would not think otherwise about you, as i earlier informed you please as soon as posible. Since you mentioned that you have four children! Oldest is 29 years! You must be successful with thousands of dollars for half an hour's work, would you not wish to hear any more excuses. Eliza Dane
